statements: SELECT * FROM running_database_performance_tuning
SELECT query_name, query_execution_time FROM running_database_performance_tuning WHERE id = 1
SELECT MAX(query_execution_time) AS max_execution_time FROM running_database_performance_tuning
SELECT query_name FROM running_database_performance_tuning WHERE optimization_techniques LIKE '%index%'
SELECT AVG(query_execution_time) AS avg_execution_time FROM running_database_performance_tuning
SELECT id, query_name, optimization_techniques, query_execution_time FROM running_database_performance_tuning ORDER BY query_execution_time DESC
SELECT * FROM running_database_performance_tuning WHERE query_execution_time > 5
SELECT query_name, query_execution_time FROM running_database_performance_tuning WHERE optimization_techniques LIKE '%index%'
SELECT query_name, SUM(query_execution_time) AS total_execution_time FROM running_database_performance_tuning GROUP BY query_name
SELECT id, query_execution_time FROM running_database_performance_tuning WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM performance_tuning;
SELECT query_text, optimization_technique FROM performance_tuning WHERE query_id = 1;
SELECT query_id, query_text, optimization_technique FROM performance_tuning WHERE optimization_technique = 'Indexing';
SELECT query_id, query_text, optimization_technique FROM performance_tuning ORDER BY query_id DESC;
SELECT execution_id, query_id, execution_time FROM query_execution WHERE execution_time > 5;
SELECT * FROM performance_tuning ORDER BY query_text DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT query_id, query_text, optimization_technique FROM performance_tuning WHERE optimization_technique = 'Indexing';

SELECT performance_tuning.query_id, query_text, execution_time FROM performance_tuning JOIN query_execution ON performance_tuning.query_id = query_execution.query_id WHERE execution_time > 10 ORDER BY query_text ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_queries FROM performance_tuning;
SELECT query_id, SUM(execution_time) AS total_execution_time FROM query_execution GROUP BY query_id HAVING total_execution_time > 50 ORDER BY query_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics;
SELECT query_id, execution_time FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM QueryLogs WHERE execution_duration > 1000;
SELECT table_name, index_name, indexed_columns FROM Indexes ORDER BY table_name, index_name ASC;
SELECT query_id, execution_time FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE indexes_used = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY execution_time DESC
SELECT query_id, execution_time FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE indexes_used = TRUE
SELECT * FROM QueryLogs WHERE execution_duration > 1000 ORDER BY execution_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM Indexes WHERE table_name = 'Users' AND index_name LIKE '%created_at%'
SELECT query, execution_timestamp FROM QueryLogs WHERE execution_duration > 500 ORDER BY execution_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_logs;
SELECT query_text, execution_time FROM query_statistics WHERE execution_time > 10;
SELECT index_name, table_name FROM index_usage ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT query_id, plan_details FROM query_plans WHERE query_id = 5;
SELECT AVG(execution_time) AS avg_time FROM query_statistics;
SELECT * FROM performance_logs WHERE log_id = 10
SELECT query_text, execution_time FROM performance_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT query_text, execution_time FROM query_statistics WHERE execution_time > 10.0 AND optimizer_stats->>'rows_examined' > '5000'
SELECT * FROM index_usage WHERE last_used < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_used DESC
SELECT query_text, plan_details FROM query_plans JOIN query_statistics ON query_plans.query_id = query_statistics.query_id
SELECT * FROM Query_Execution_Stats ORDER BY query_execution_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT query_id, query_execution_date FROM Query_Execution_Stats WHERE query_execution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT index_name, table_name, index_type FROM Index_Usage WHERE last_usage_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_usage_date DESC;
SELECT query_id, optimization_steps FROM Query_Optimization_Log WHERE optimization_time > 5;
SELECT machine_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage, storage_usage FROM Hardware_Stats WHERE cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT * FROM Query_Execution_Stats ORDER BY query_execution_time DESC, query_execution_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT query_id, query_execution_time FROM Query_Execution_Stats WHERE query_execution_time > 5.0 ORDER BY query_execution_date DESC;
SELECT table_name, index_name FROM Index_Usage WHERE last_usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(memory_usage) AS avg_memory_usage, MAX(cpu_usage) AS max_cpu_usage FROM Hardware_Stats GROUP BY machine_id HAVING max_cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT Q.query_id, Q.optimization_steps, L.optimization_time FROM Query_Optimization_Log L JOIN Query_Execution_Stats Q ON L.query_id = Q.query_id ORDER BY optimization_time DESC LIMIT 5;
